label: A7B2_hR18_166_a2cdh_2c-001
title: Er$_{2}$Co$_{7}$ Structure
comments:
The ICSD lists Gd$_{2}$Co$_{7}$ as the prototype, but (Ostertag, 1967) only gives atomic coordinates for Er$_{2}$Co$_{7}$, so we will use that instead. 
 Hexagonal settings of this structure can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
